CustomField.description: Absolute path to get BCC URL to display medium pictures (for example 200ko) (used in formula fields in ProductCatalogue__c) For example: 'http://louisvuitton.com/images/is/image/lv/1/PP_VP_M/' + file name (louis-vuitton--M44062_PM2_Front view.jpg)
CustomField.label: Bcc Medium Picture Url
